These alerts cover journeys on the Tube, London Overground, DLR and TfL Rail.
Tell us where and when you travel, and we'll send you a message if your regular journey is disrupted. It means you can replan if you need to, or check for updates before you set off.
You can also choose to get a daily email with a live snapshot of the network - handy if you often travel around London.
You need a TfL account to set up an alert . You can use your Oyster or contactless account or you can create an account now .
